thread.title: Watch Lil Uzi Vert Turn Anime in Bizarre “Ps & Qs” Video
thread.title_full: Watch Lil Uzi Vert Turn Anime in Bizarre “Ps & Qs” Video

author: Jake Boyer
title: Watch Lil Uzi Vert Turn Anime in Bizarre “Ps & Qs” Video
text:
Of all the defining aesthetics of 2016, the at-times cute and at-other-times frightening filter options of Snapchat will surely live on the longest. And it seems that Lil Uzi Vert is the first person to ensure that these visual hallmarks will live on in 2017 with his new video “Ps & Qs,” a manic new music video that takes the app’s now infamous ‘googly eye’ look to horrific new heights.
The video depicts Uzi at a school in Japan, wherein he becomes involved in a fight with his nemesis to save his girlfriend named Brittany. This is all told using the aforementioned Snapchat filters as well as frequent forays into the world of actual anime, lending a different visual style seemingly every 30 seconds.
“Ps & Qs” initially appeared on Uzi’s mixtape Lil Uzi Vert Vs. the World which dropped last spring, but in the time since he also managed to release the full-length The Perfect LUV Tape . Stay tuned to see where Uzi heads this year.
Stream Lil Uzi Vert’s 2016 full length Lil Uzi Vert Vs. the World below via Spotify:

In other music news, Travis Scott has announced his third official album titled Astroworld . Get the scoop on the upcoming full length right here .
